Title: Specimen Request
Description:
Kyparite worms have shown extreme adaptations in order to mimic the environment around them. They can also grow to immense sizes at rates which are nearly unheard of for most creatures.

Their physiology could provide valuable insight into further mutations.

Bring me sample shards from the muck tunnelers in the shallows near Zan'vess.
ObjectivesText: Collect 6 Kyparite Shards from Muck Tunnelers in The Briny Muck.
RewardText: Well look at that, you actually got it done. I half expected to be scooping your remains out of the muck with a jar.
